sec.p: We found that the density of juveniles (individuals/ha) at pre-hibernation was greater at Atigun than at Toolik, particularly in 2012 (2011: 1.17 ± 0.37 vs. 0.85 ± 0.33; 2012: 1.89 ± 0.46 vs. 0.19 ± 0.13, respectively; Fig. 4). We also found from weaning to hibernation juvenile density decreased 54% at Toolik but only 44% at Atigun.
